amendatorysection.catchline: El-Hajj Malik El-Shabazz, Malcolm X Day.
amendatorysection.para: May 19 of each year shall be recognized as El-Hajj Malik El-Shabazz, Malcolm X Day, and shall be set apart for holding suitable exercises in the schools of the state in recognition of the sacrifices of the late Nebraska Hall of Fame inductee El-Hajj Malik El-Shabazz, Malcolm X and his contributions to the betterment of society.
